main_name: 100% Organic Matcha
product_name: 100% Organic Matcha
description: Energy booster. Power through study or work with Matcha - it's filled with the stuff that's thought to keep you focused and energised. The combo of caffeine and amino acid L-theanine in matcha buddy up to give you a slower release of energy. This means no caffeine jitters, and also means you can power on for longer. Great for hitting the books or before a work out!  Our Matcha is a highly prized powdered green tea tradtionally used as part of the Japanese tea ceremony. Enjoy straight up on it's own or as a latte, sweetened with a little honey and a dash of cold milk of choice.Store in a cool, dry place.
ingredients_detail: 100% certified organic ingredients: Powdered green tea

main_name: Apple Maple Muffin Loose Leaf Feature Cube
product_name: Apple Maple Muffin Loose Leaf Feature Cube
description: Net Wt. 120g/4.2oz  Prepare yourself to taste a green tea like no other…Juicy apple, sweet maple, dashes of cinnamon and pieces of caramel transform this tea into a baker’s delight! Sit back, sip and savour this apple dessert with all the benefits of green tea!

main_name: Sticky Chai Trilogy
product_name: Sticky Chai Trilogy
description: Net Wt 300g / 10.5oz  Chai just got three times stickier! Try not to choose favourites as you take your pick of our classic Sticky Honey Chai, caffeine-free Sticky Honey Rooibos and plant-based Sticky Turmeric Chai.  Contains: 3 x Loose Leaf Teas/Tisanes
ingredients_detail: Sticky Honey Chai: Black tea, honey (35.8%), cinnamon, cardamon, cloves, natural vanilla flavouring, ginger, salt +Sticky Honey Rooibos: Honey (35.8%), rooibos (17.9%), honeybush, cinnamon, cardamon pods, cardamon seed, cloves, peppercorns, ginger, salt +Sticky Turmeric Chai: Black tea, agave, cloves, cardamon pods, black pepper, cinnamon, ginger, star anise, turmeric (1.5%), cardamon seed, salt

main_name: Sticky Choc Chai 250g Foil

description: Net Wt. 250g / 8.8oz  Choc lovers need chai too! Full-bodied black tea, classic chai spices and indulgent sprinkles of cocoa husks come together to bring you a tea-lovers dream in a mug. This iconic chai favourite delivers a creamy texture and smooth chocolatey taste. What are you waiting for?
ingredients_detail: For the perfect brew: Place 2 teaspoons Sticky Choc Chai and 250ml/8.4fl oz milk in a saucepan and heat, stirring constantly. Strain into a cup using a strainer. For a lighter brew, use an evenly split ratio of milk and water.

ingredients_detail: For the perfect brew: Place 2 teaspoons Sticky Honey Chai and 250ml/8.4fl oz milk in a saucepan and heat, stirring constantly. Strain into a cup using a Sticky Chai Strainer. For a lighter brew, use an evenly split ratio of milk and water.

main_name: T2 Ceremonial Matcha Whisk
product_name: T2 Ceremonial Matcha Whisk
description: Complete your matcha collection with this Japanese handmade ceremonial matcha bamboo whisk! With 72 hand-crafted wires to help you brew the perfect matcha, this premium dark bamboo design is sturdy enough for everyday use, yet still fancy enough for those special ceremonial occasions. Simply add some matcha powder and hot water to your bowl, and whisk in an M motion until the matcha is blended and bubbles form on the surface. No matter which way you like it, in a latte, over ice or straight up, this tool is essential for any matcha connoisseur!
ingredients_detail: Bamboo. Gently handwash only, not suitable for the dishwasher. Dry with a soft cloth.

main_name: T2 Everyday Matcha Whisk
product_name: T2 Everyday Matcha Whisk
description: Traditionally used in Japanese Zen tea ceremonies, this whisk (or chasen) is handcrafted from a single piece of bamboo that is split up to 80 times to create perfectly smooth and frothy matcha. Simply add some matcha powder and hot water to your bowl, and whisk in an M motion until the matcha is blended and bubbles form on the surface. No matter which way you like it, in a latte, over ice or straight up, this tool is essential for any matcha connoisseur!
ingredients_detail: Bamboo. Gentle hand was only, not suitable for microwave or dishwasher.

main_name: T2 The Smith Family - Tote Bag
product_name: T2 The Smith Family - Tote Bag
description: T2 The Smith Family - Tote BagThe tote bag that gives a cup about helping children and young people in need. We created this limited-edition tote bag in partnership with The Smith Family to help raise support and awareness for Australian children living in poverty. This beautiful cotton tote bag was designed by our in-house artist, with proceeds donated to The Smith Family. Grab yours and you’ll be helping The Smith Family provide the extra educational support young Australians from disadvantaged backgrounds need to stay in school and shape a bright future.
ingredients_detail: 100% Cotton. Hand wash in cold water. Wash with similar colours.
